sqlMap.select: SELECT row_number() OVER() AS row,* FROM( SELECT * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM api_data t WHERE $qry$ $filter$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE $corpfilter$ $dynamicClauseWhere$ ) AS T ORDER BY srctype , maptype ,code LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$

SELECT count(*) AS counts FROM ( SELECT row_number() OVER() AS row,* FROM( SELECT * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM api_data t WHERE $qry$ $filter$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE $corpfilter$ $dynamicClauseWhere$ ) AS T ) aa
